name: Space Shooter Audio Demo
description:
Game demo that showcases a Space Shooter like music

  • Use Arrows or WASD keys to move the space ship
  • Press Left CTRL key or Left Click to Fire
  • Press "ESCAPE" key to open in-game options

All assets (except for the music) are from "Space Shooter Tutorial".
Click here if you want to hear just the music.

Game made by Raúl Ibarra Aranda, using assets from "Space Shooter Tutorial". 
Music made by www.soundxp.net  Copyright: Gamingsoft Ltd. All Rights Reserved.
